item.description:
Looking back at our fly-outs, I've noticed something, we don't go North much. Well here we go! Have you been to Sanford (SFM) Lately? They have a great breakfast at the Cockpit Cafe located on the field. Feel like taking the Portland Light House tour after our delicious breakfast? Then check this out.

I did this once a couple of years ago with my dad. It was a lot of fun and very scenic, one you won't forget. I made a stop at Biddeford (B19) and the owner of the FBO highly suggested that I do this.

If I remember correctly there are about five or six light houses along the coast within a few miles of each other. From here we contact Portland Apc. and request flight following with the light house tour. These guys do a great job and I found it very easy to do. Portland actually vectors you at a set altitude towards and around all the light houses, they even spin you around if you want to view them all over again in the other direction.

So don't forget to ask your loved one or a friend to join you. Your not going to want to miss this one and don't forget that camera...HOW ABOUT THAT.
